atlantis.engine.graphics

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.engine.graphics.BaseEntity
      • atlantis.engine.graphics.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, IUpdateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sprite, SpriteGroup, SpriteText

    public class Entity
extends BaseEntity
    Define a basic entity who is updated and drawn on each frame if enabled and/or visible.
    Author:
    Yannick
